attacks.name: Ember
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy attached to this Pokémon.

abilities.name: Burning Draft
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may attach a Fighting or Fire Energy card from your discard pile to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Flame Ball
attacks.effect: Move a basic Energy from this Pokémon to 1 of your Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Splatter
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

attacks.name: Hail Storm
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Team Magma Pokémon, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage times the amount of Energy attached to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Dual Blizzard
attacks.effect: Discard 2 Water Energy attached to this Pokémon. This attack does 80 damage to 2 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Power Saver
abilities.effect: If there are 4 or fewer Team Aqua Pokémon in play, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Aqua Impact
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage for each Colorless in your opponent's Active Pokémon's Retreat Cost.

abilities.name: Sludge Festival
abilities.effect: The Retreat Cost of each Pokémon in play (except for Team Aqua Pokémon) is Colorless more.

attacks.name: Pester
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 60 more damage.

attacks.name: Venomous Fang
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Venom Tail
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, discard an Energy attached to that Pokémon.

attacks.name: Telekinesis
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

abilities.name: Magma Switch
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may move a basic Energy from 1 of your Pokémon to 1 of your Team Magma Pokémon.

attacks.name: Take Down
attacks.effect: This Pokémon does 10 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Rock Stomp
attacks.effect: Discard as many Fighting Energy attached to your Pokémon as you like. This attack does 40 damage times the amount of Fighting Energy you discarded.

attacks.name: Boulder Storm
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon that has any damage counters on it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

abilities.name: Power Saver
abilities.effect: If there are 4 or fewer Team Magma Pokémon in play, this Pokémon can't attack.

attacks.name: Magma Quake
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon already has any damage counters on it, this attack does 80 more damage.

attacks.name: Roar
attacks.effect: Your opponent switches his or her Active Pokémon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Infiltrate
attacks.effect: Your opponent reveals his or her hand.

attacks.name: Teampact
attacks.effect: Flip a coin for each Team Aqua Pokémon you have in play. This attack does 30 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Hostile Fang
attacks.effect: If your opponent's Active Pokémon is a Team Aqua Pokémon, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Fin Smack
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

abilities.name: Aqua Search
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may search your deck for a Team Aqua Pokémon, reveal it, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.effect: Search your deck for up to 2 Basic Team Magma Pokémon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Team Play
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage times the number of Team Magma Pokémon on your Bench.

cards.name: Aqua Diffuser

attacks.name: Aqua Diffuser
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Confused and Poisoned.

cards.effect: The Team Aqua Pokémon this card is attached to can also use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)

cards.name: Magma Pointer

attacks.name: Magma Pointer
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

cards.effect: The Team Magma Pokémon this card is attached to can also use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)

cards.name: Team Aqua Admin
cards.effect: Attach a basic Energy card from your discard pile to your Active Team Aqua Pokémon.

cards.name: Team Aqua Grunt
cards.effect: Discard a card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card, you can't play this card.) Draw 3 cards. If you discarded a Team Aqua Pokémon, draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Team Aqua's Great Ball
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Team Aqua Pokémon and a basic Water Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Team Aqua's Secret Base
cards.effect: The Retreat Cost of each Pokémon in play (except for Team Aqua Pokémon) is Colorless more.

cards.name: Team Magma Admin
cards.effect: Put up to 3 Team Magma Pokémon from your discard pile into your hand.

cards.name: Team Magma Grunt
cards.effect: Discard a card from your hand. (If you can't discard a card, you can't play this card.) Draw 3 cards. If you discarded a Team Magma Pokémon, draw 1 more card.

cards.name: Team Magma's Great Ball
cards.effect: Search your deck for a Basic Team Magma Pokémon and a basic Fighting Energy card, reveal them, and put them into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

cards.name: Team Magma's Secret Base
cards.effect: Whenever any player puts a Basic Pokémon (except for Team Magma Pokémon) from his or her hand onto his or her Bench, put 2 damage counters on that Pokémon.

cards.name: Double Aqua Energy
cards.effect:
This card can only be attached to Team Aqua Pokémon. Discard this card at the end of the turn you attached it.

This card provides WaterWater Energy only while it is attached to a Team Aqua Pokémon.

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Team Aqua Pokémon, discard this card.)

cards.name: Double Magma Energy
cards.effect:
This card can only be attached to Team Magma Pokémon. Discard this card at the end of the turn you attached it.

This card provides FightingFighting Energy only while it is attached to a Team Magma Pokémon.

(If this card is attached to anything other than a Team Magma Pokémon, discard this card.)
